topics.title: Introduction to Vue.js
topics.description: Learn the basics of Vue.js, including its purpose, benefits, and how it compares to other frameworks.

topics.title: Setting Up the Development Environment
topics.description: A step-by-step guide to installing Node.js, Vue CLI, and setting up your first Vue project.

topics.title: Vue Instance and Template Syntax
topics.description: Understand the Vue instance, basic template syntax, and how Vue renders content dynamically.

topics.title: Directives in Vue.js
topics.description: Explore Vue directives such as v-bind, v-if, v-for, and v-model for reactive behavior.

topics.title: Components and Props
topics.description: Learn how to break your application into reusable components and pass data using props.

topics.title: Event Handling and Methods
topics.description: Discover how to handle user interactions with event listeners and define custom methods.

topics.title: Computed Properties and Watchers
topics.description: Understand the use of computed properties for derived state and watchers for reacting to data changes.

topics.title: Vue Router Basics
topics.description: Set up Vue Router to create a multi-page application with navigation and routes.

topics.title: State Management with Vuex
topics.description: An introduction to Vuex for managing state in larger applications and the store-pattern basics.

topics.title: Building and Deploying Your Vue App
topics.description: Learn how to build your Vue project for production and deploy it using services like Netlify or Vercel.
